thread.title: Whiteout & Chillout At Putahracsa Hua HinTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Whiteout & Chillout At Putahracsa Hua HinTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Whiteout & Chillout At Putahracsa Hua HinTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Whiteout & Chillout At Putahracsa Hua Hin Published on : Friday, September 11, 2015
For just one night only – Saturday, 26th September at 18:30 to 21:00 hrs. – the evening will be a whiter shade of pale as you chill to the cool sounds of DJ Bond, whilst savouring unlimited beer, as well as wine and Sangria (both white of course). It wouldn’t be a unique Putahracsa evening without some special food and if oysters are to your taste, you won’t be disappointed with our Oyster Station, alongside all the other live food available.
So save the date for the WHITE BEACH CLUB CHILL OUT at The Oceanside Beach Club & Restaurant, a 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence winner, with the price of THB 999 net per person. And to round off the whiter-than-white theme, everyone dressed ALL IN WHITE receives a 10% discount!
The restaurant serves Thai & Mediterranean dishes with authentic BBQ and is open daily from 11.00 a.m. – 11.00 p.m. on weekdays and from 11.00 a.m. – midnight on weekends.
